customer_reviews.title: Good for your beard
customer_reviews.text: Your beard ain't like the hair on your head. I started growing my beard out, and it's super curly and dries out easily. I started using this a couple times a week. It's important not to over-wash your beard, but this is made just for your beard. It doesn't over wash it, it leaves it nice and soft and has a mild woody scent to it, not overpowering, just enough to notice on occasion. It's advisable to use this in conjunction with something to moisturize your beard with something like a beard oil or beard conditioner. Washing it will clean not only dirt but remove some of the natural oils in your beard.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carlin

product_meta.title: Billy Jealousy Beard Wash, 8 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
We're in the biz to get rid of frizz with our Mens Beard Wash. This sulfate-free formula cleans, softens and detangles even the gnarliest of beards. Aloe and gentle conditioners leave beard silky-smooth, manageable and frizz-free without the flakes. Green tea extract stimulates circulation and strengthens hair follicles to help beard appear fuller and healthier. Customers and men’s interest magazines agree, this is the one grooming essential every dude should own. Safe for sensitive skin.

SINCE 2004, BILLY JEALOUSY HAS BECOME AN ICON IN THE GROOMING INDUSTRY FOR AWARD-WINNING, CRUELTY-FREE FORMULAS.
Since 2004, Billy Jealousy has become an icon in the grooming industry for award-winning, cruelty-free formulas.
